title._content: ["Kenarden Lodge," John Stewart Kennedy house, Shore Path, Bar Harbor, Maine.  (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Kenarden Lodge," John Stewart Kennedy house, Shore Path, Bar Harbor, Maine. Italian Garden, view to pergola and Champlain Mountain] [1920 summer] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Rowe & Baker, 1892. Landscape: Probably Rowe & Baker, 1892. Also, replanting of Italian garden by Beatrix Jones Farrand, before 1914. Today: House razed 1962, Italian garden restored. On slide: Blind embossed stamp "Frances B. Johnston, New York." Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Published in Gardens for a Beautiful America / Sam Watters. New York: Acanthus Press, 2012. Plate 18. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16937 Call Number: LC-J717-X110- 45
